dcterms:creator: G. Hua
M. Brown
S. Winder
dcterms:description: The Multi-view Stereo Correspondence (MSC) dataset consists of more than 1.5 million grayscale patches extracted from images of the Statue of Liberty, Notre Dame, and Half Dome. It includes pairs of matching and non-matching patches extracted using the Difference of Gaussian (DoG) interest point detector and matched using 3D multi-view reconstructions.
dcterms:title: Multi-view Stereo Correspondence (MSC) dataset
